headline: Vertex Announces Program Updates for Type 1 Diabetes Portfolio
summary: BOSTON, March 28, 2025--Vertex Pharmaceuticals Incorporated (Nasdaq: VRTX) today announced several updates on the Company’s type 1 diabetes (T1D) portfolio.

headline: Rattled by the Stock Market Sell-Off? These 3 Stocks Outperformed the S&P 500 During the Great Recession
summary: The economy has been on shaky ground for a while, and President Trump's tariffs and trade wars could finally send it into a recession.  If you're wondering which stocks might do well even if the U.S. economy slumps, you may want to look back to see which ones thrived during the last prolonged recession -- the Great Recession, which took place between December 2007 and June 2009.  The S&P 500 fell by 36% during that period.
